name: inexpertly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows little skill: The interviews are inexpertly conducted. He spent a great deal of time inexpertly milking complaining cows. See
inexpert
More examplesFewer examplesHe opened a bottle inexpertly. She might occasionally move awkwardly on the tennis court and volley inexpertly, but her status as a star is secure.Most of the rooms are inexpertly painted.
